subs.text: A URL that includes a path to a folder in S3. When you open that URL in the web browser, a page opens up with S3 viewing that path. This would save me a lot of steps and scrolling. Buckets can get very long, esp over many years!
Of course please let me know if this feature already exists.
Update: Of course it does. Just look in the address area in the browser. ;-)
